message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but $140 is a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $130.  What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I can do $137, but I have to say that's as low as I can go. I really think you'll love this product.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  $137 is getting closer, but I'm still hoping to land at $135.  I'm really keen on this product, so I'm willing to go a little higher than my initial offer.

I can see you're really interested in this product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $136. That's the lowest I can go, but I think it's a fair price considering the value this product will bring to you.
